After restraining the target with a snake, Orochimaru summons several replicas of his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Orochimaru)|Sword of Kusanagi]] which attacks the enemy from every direction.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|'All directions'|八方|happō}} literally means 'eight directions', referring to the four cardinal and the four ordinal directions. In this case it can also refer to [[Wikipedia:Yamata no Orochi|Yamata-no-Orochi]].
